full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Title
2.4 Organization Development Consultant for Department of National Defence's Digital Transformation Office (DTO)

### Reference Number
cb-768-50366405

### Publication Date
2024-03-15

### Closing Date and Time
2024-03-29, 14:00:00_EST

### Unspsc Description
Change Management, Communication, and Advisory Services

### Procurement Category
Service

### Contract Type
Competitive, Selective Tendering

### Contract Period
Approximately 1 year

### Estimated Level of Effort
200 days

### Contact Information
Name: Raghid Fathallah
Email: raghid.fathallah@forces.gc.ca
Phone: (343) 549-0501

### Notice URL
Nil

### Contract Details

The Department of National Defence's Digital Transformation Office (DTO) is seeking a senior organization development consultant to support the expansion of its mandate and creation of new directorates general. The consultant will work closely with partners and stakeholders to achieve a seamless transition.

The successful consultant will be responsible for:

* Reviewing the existing organizational structure to identify areas for improvement
* Developing a new organizational structure that aligns with the DTO's mandate and objectives
* Providing change management and communication services to support the transition

The contract is expected to last approximately one year, with an estimated level of effort of 200 days.

**Eligibility**
This tender is open to suppliers with a valid Supply Arrangement (SA) under E60ZT-18TSPS, with a Tier 1 qualification under the Business Consulting/Change Management Stream, Category 2.4 Organization Development Consultant, and Level of Expertise: Senior.

**Set-Aside**
This procurement is set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business.

**Solicited Suppliers**
The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:

1. ADRM Technology Consulting Group Corp.
2. ADRM Technology Consulting Group Corp. and Randstad Interim Inc
3. Aniko Consultants Inc., Samson & Associates-CPA Consulting Inc.-Samson & Associates CPA-Consulting Inc., in Joint Venture
4. Donna Cona Inc.
5. IPSS INC.
6. Crestway Consulting (Malarsoft Technology Corporation)
7. Maverin Business Services Inc.
8. MINDWIRE SYSTEMS LTD., Akkada Professional Services inc., HubSpoke Inc., in Joint Venture
9. MRT (
